newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sony Music bid-only on bright forecast.
newsitem.headline: Sony Music bid-only on bright forecast.

text.p: Shares in Sony Music Entertainment (Japan) Inc were bid-only on Thursday morning after the firm released on Wednesday a bright group earnings forecast for 1997/98, traders said.
Sony Music is a comprehensive software company, affiliated with Sony Corp.
Sony Music's shares were bid-only at 4,620 yen at 0120 GMT, way above its Wednesday close of 4,420 yen.

On Wednesday, Sony Music said it expects its group net profits for the business year that ends on March 31, 1998, to be 26.50 billion yen, far larger than its net group profits the previous year of 12.82 billion yen.
